title: Build database of language teachers
snippet:
Hi all,

I need to build a worldwide database of private language teachers and independent language schools. I will need the following fields:

1. Email (required)
2. Contact form URL
3. Source name (ex. Google; "ZYZ listing of language teachers" etc.)
4. Source reference (Exact Google keywords used; listing URL etc)
5. Location city
6. Location country

We are only interested in private language teachers/tutors and independently owned small language schools. Public, state or private Universities, Colleges etc. are not acceptable.

*EXAMPLE 1: GOOGLE SEARCH*

Source name: Google
Source reference: language school marseille france
Email: contact-mrs@afaixmarseille.org
Contact form URL: http://afaixmarseille.org/en/contact/aix-en-provence-alliance-francaise
City: Marseille
Country: France

*EXAMPLE 2: DIRECTORY LISTINGS*

https://www.gooverseas.com/language-schools

Source name: Go Overseas directory
Source reference: https://www.gooverseas.com/language-schools
Email: info@destinationlangues.com
Contact form URL: http://www.destinationlangues.com/home/contact/?lang=en
City: Marseille
Country: France

Please quote your price per 1,000 records to collect this data from all possible/available sources.

Additional examples of directories, feel free to suggest more: 

http://learnoutlive.com/private-language-teachers/
http://www.skypelearn.com/skype-language-teachers-directory.html
http://www.languageopenlearning.com

*SEPARATE QUOTE*

Please quote separately to create user logins/accounts on membership sites and contact teachers manually by hand (text and exact instructions will be provided). 

Some examples of such sites, please feel free to suggest more:

http://www.verbalplanet.com/tutor-directory.asp
http://www.italki.com

I will ask you to work in Google Doc spreadsheet so I can review your progress and collaborate in real time to make sure there is no miscommunication.

Happy bidding!
